cards.title: Shar
cards.subtitle: The One Below
cards.summary: Goddess of darkness, chaos, redemption, etc. All-around fairly cool lady/divinity.

cards.title: Selune
cards.subtitle: The One Above
cards.summary: Goddess of moonlight, serenity, etc. Watches over every single Lunelle ever and has great croissant recipes.

cards.title: Selune and Shar are sisters
cards.summary: You heard Selune and Shar are.... sisters!
